{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Fitbit |model=Aria Wi-Fi Smart Scale |revision=(FB201B) |upc=898628002137 |ean= |asin=B0077L8YOO |price=129.95 |est_release_date=04/2012 |fcc_date=10/01/2010 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=body scale |fcc_id=YOPGS1011MEE |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=n/a, battery powered |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=GainSpan GS1011MEE |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=GainSpan |wi1_chip1_model=GS1011 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=Aria XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Aria [A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.240.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:1D:C9 |oui_eth= }} [http://www.fitbit.com/product/aria Product page] There are two models of this device - FB201W (White) and FB201B (Black). [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fitbit '''Fitbit''' on Wikipedia]
[http://gdgt.com/fitbit/aria/ On '''gdgt'''] :Released 04/23/2012 The device assumes an SSID of '''Aria XXXXXX''' and IP address of 192.168.240.1 when the device is in Setup mode. Initial setup information (the WiFi SSID and encryption key) is sent unencrypted (in plaintext) over the air to the device. This device is powered by 4 AA batteries (which are included with the device). {{lowercase}}
